# Justin Donaldson 

![](img/justin.jpg)

Justin is a Data Scientist/Engineer with decades of experience in both Academia and Industry.  He was formerly a Principal Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer for Special Projects at Salesforce. He is responsible for incubating advanced applied machine learning projects for  internal SFDC teams and external SFDC customers.  He has a Ph.D. and M.S. from Indiana University, where he focused on unsupervised machine learning and recommender systems.
